question: Who among the following wrote the book, "Tribal Movements in India"?
explanation:
K.S. Singh wrote the book, ”Tribal Movements in India” and has divided the tribal movements in three phases which are as follows-
1.First Phase – Between 1795 – 1860
2.Second Phase – Between 1860 – 1920
3.Third Phase – From 1920 – 1947
